about_the_game:
Who Are You? is an open world, narrative game set in limbo, moments after she has taken her own life.

Walkthrough all of the key moments that had let her into taking her own life. But only after she travels through these moments for the second time in limbo she comes to the realization that she has made a mistake in doing so.

KEY FEATURES
*A compelling story that will pull on your heartstring and make you feel for the action of action she has taken.
*A really beautiful-looking world with tons of amazing colors.
detailed_description:
Who Are You? is an open world, narrative game set in limbo, moments after she has taken her own life.

Walkthrough all of the key moments that had let her into taking her own life. But only after she travels through these moments for the second time in limbo she comes to the realization that she has made a mistake in doing so.

KEY FEATURES
*A compelling story that will pull on your heartstring and make you feel for the action of action she has taken.
*A really beautiful-looking world with tons of amazing colors.
name: Who Are You?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 - 7100U CPU @ 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 640 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-core Processor GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 640 MB available space

short_description: A girl had done the unthinkable, taken her own life. You travel through the key moments of her life that have lead her to take her own life. But only after she travels through all these important moments of her life again does she realize she had made a huge mistake.
